OrgName: Harman International Industries, Incorporated and its U.S. subsidiaries
activities: Personal data is processed by the organization as part of its human resources, research and development, customer service, e-commerce, mobile application services and account management activities.  The organization will use the information for business operations (including online sales to consumers), employee development, administration and planning, usage analytics, or when required in the course of judicial or administrative proceedings.
